nodes.text: The New Jedi Order: Agents of Chaos I: Hero's Trial (American Foundation for the Blind audiobook)

The New Jedi Order: Agents of Chaos I: Hero's Trial is the unabridged audiobook version of the Star Wars Legends novel of the same name, written by James Luceno. Performed by Chuck Benson, the audiobook was released by American Foundation for the Blind in 2006.
